alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 6:42PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones and northeastern Taylor Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 641 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merkel, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, Nugent, Hamby, Dyess Afb, Impact, Hodges, Lake Fort Phantom Hill and Stith. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 267 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Texas.
